commands.name: bulk_email
commands.description: Bulk emails sponsors from Notion database

commands.name: registration_status
commands.description: Gets the current registration status and numbers

commands.name: new_post
commands.description: Notifies #updates of a new outreach post in a server

options.name: server_name
options.description: The name of the server you posted in

options.name: channel
options.description: The channel of the server you posted in

options.name: everyone_mentioned
options.description: Whether or not you mentioned @everyone in the post

options.name: member_count
options.description: The number of members that the server has

options.name: notes
options.description: Anything else that needs to be mentioned
